ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats}
ygData.msgSnippet: Can someone post all the detail on how to get this item? It is like the Holy Grail for my Guild, The Drun ken Nation. Info on the mobs level, level group
ygData.messageBody:
Can someone post all the detail on how to get this item? It is like the Holy
Grail for my Guild, The Drun'ken Nation. Info on the mobs level, level group
needed and such would be great. Thanks

Adol, Lush o' The First Degree, Drun'ken Nation
Rodcet Nife
